ygData.subject: about to begin tinkering....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there! I am getting set to begin my tinkering career.. and have been unable to loacte any really informative sites about the trade. A fe that list basic
ygData.messageBody:
Hi there!

I am getting set to begin my tinkering career.. and have been unable to
loacte any really informative sites about the trade. A fe that list basic
recipies of what seem to be useless things (not that thye describe the
functions much) but surely there are great things to make!

Any thoughts, clues, trivial lists, pointers, ideas.. etc would be great.
This list seems to be the best place so far that i have found.

Though that post about blowing 4000 plat in trying to make rebreathers is
scary..

Stricken,
lev 15 Necro
Vallon Zek
